attributes.additional_details:
Make employment agencies advertise real jobs not fake ones, also temp working make eployment agencies tell the truth, on how long they will last.

we need jobs not fake adverts just so they can get us on their books and ignore us.

Get some regulation on this industry thay pray on the unfortunate, if they dont help people they should be closed down and get this fake advertising abolished on real live jobs should be advertised.

Also stop the closed shop vacancies, let everyone apply for them not just internal staff.

we need jobs in this country, let the fluent english speakers have the jobs, too many non nationals that can not speak english get the jobs.
